title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-4.12 - Alphabetical cross index
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-4.12 - Alphabetical cross index

State Regulations

An index file should be maintained alphabetically by
surname, of all tenants residing in the project. Such a file will assist
cashiers in locating tenants' ledger cards. This file should show the tenant's
name, address, telephone number, account number, monthly authorized rental, date of occupancy, and date vacated. As tenants vacate the development, the
file of such tenants should be withdrawn. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-4.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
